column4: I'm using Ubuntu and for some weird reason, it will "hibernate" and "suspend" but it'll never open up again. D:
It's supposed to WAKE UP after I unhibernate or unsuspend it. But it never does.
what version of ubuntu are you using
how do I check which version of ubuntu I'm using. I'm pretty sure it's a newish version.
open you Terminal and Type uname -ar
past the result in ubuntu pastbin
yes you are using ubuntu 10.04 lucid
does that mean that I can't "suspend" and "hibernate"
nops it does not that mean actully just give me a time to think on you problem
I've tried installing that apmd thing but it's still not letting me 'suspend"
ok hold up let me look at tat
